Text: Do you remember the name of a series that has the same concept as America's Got Powers, but it's about a girl that wins the same type of tournament but she brings about the destruction of the world.  It's from some comic company that seems to only do comics w/ female heroines I believe?  I can't remember the name of the company or the comic!  Thank You!
@kakuichi1 It sounds like you're talking about Idolized by Aspen MLT
